{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20564v1", "title": "The number of cuspidal representations over a function field and its
  behavior under base changes", "summary": "Let $X$ be a smooth projective curve over a finite field $\mathbb{F}_q$, $k$
be its function field, and $G$ be a simply connected almost simple split group
over $\mathbb{F}_q$. We also write $G$ for its structure over $k$. We calculate
the sum of multiplicities of all cuspidal representations of $G$ satisfying a
given condition assuming the conjectural trace formula. We also observe how the
sum changes if we replace $X$ by its base change
$X\otimes_{\mathbb{F}_q}\mathbb{F}_{q^m}$.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-04-29T09:09:03Z"}
